name: Flashmarble Crusaders of Ruin
description: Surviving a hellish meteor shower early in the family history, are the Flashmarble Crusaders of Ruin blessed or cursed? They're also known for their exceptional flashmarble craftsmanship. Now biding their time, secretly bestowing life upon inanimate things, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
